scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/purgecss --css styles.css --content index.html 404.html script.js --output styles.purged.css && node_modules/.bin/cleancss -o styles.min.css styles.purged.css && rm styles.purged.css && node_modules/.bin/terser script.js -c -m -o script.min.js
scripts.audit: npx lighthouse http://localhost:8080/index.html --quiet --chrome-flags='--headless --no-sandbox' --output=json --output-path=lh-report.json && npx @axe-core/cli http://localhost:8080/index.html --save axe-report.json
